    Junkai (Abraham) Huang

    I’m a year 4 undergraduate in Computer Science & Mathematics at the Hong Kong University of Science and Technology, enthusiastic in computer vision and robotics. My research interests lie at the intersection of 3D vision and deep learning. I’m now working on research topics regarding Neural Radiance Fields (NeRFs), under the supervision of Prof. Chi-Keung Tang and Prof. Yu-Wing Tai. I’m applying for a CS Ph.D. position in 2023 Fall!
